Text:
Don't understand why to separate 1 normal mkv into many archives... 

Could someone please explain?
I don't know why the usual uploaders, like tvteam or eztv, aren't uploading them for some reason without any .rar divided in so many parts.

Yeah, as if the ISP can't check filenames.

I hate these RARs!!! Hope you come to your senses some day and stop using them!
